<Text: The Man from Snowy River and Other Verses
The Man from Snowy River and Other Verses
1:
--------------------
Text: The Man from Snowy River and Other Verses:  It was released in hardback by Angus and Robertson in 1895, and features the poet's widely anthologised poems "The Man from Snowy River", "Clancy of the Overflow", "Saltbush Bill" and "The Man from Ironbark".
